blueprint.customerActions: Customer sees an ad for the service on social media.
blueprint.frontstageInteractions: Social media ad display and website link.
blueprint.backstageInteractions: Marketing team runs targeted ad campaigns.
blueprint.supportProcesses: CRM system for targeted marketing; ad management tools.
blueprint.physicalEvidence: Social media posts, website content, display ads.

blueprint.customerActions: Customer visits website, browses services, and reads reviews.
blueprint.frontstageInteractions: Website homepage, search filters, and product listings.
blueprint.backstageInteractions: Backend processes manage content and ensure up-to-date data.
blueprint.supportProcesses: Content management system (CMS) and review aggregator.
blueprint.physicalEvidence: Website visuals, customer testimonials, review pages.

blueprint.customerActions: Customer adds item to cart and completes checkout.
blueprint.frontstageInteractions: Shopping cart, checkout flow, and payment confirmation.

blueprint.customerActions: Customer receives updates on delivery and receives product.
blueprint.frontstageInteractions: Delivery tracking, SMS or app notifications.
blueprint.backstageInteractions: Dispatch assigns delivery personnel; updates tracking.
blueprint.physicalEvidence: Package, delivery status notifications, tracking page.

blueprint.customerActions: Customer provides feedback or contacts support for any issues.
blueprint.frontstageInteractions: Customer support chat or feedback form in app.
blueprint.backstageInteractions: Support team processes feedback or resolves issues.
blueprint.supportProcesses: Customer support platform, feedback analysis tool.
